Melodyne is a software application for OS X or Windows with which you can edit audio in a more musical way than was ever thought possible. In Melodyne, you work with notes â€“ and not with a meaningless wave form. You donâ€™t just see where the music gets louder or quieter but also where notes begin and end and at what pitch they lie.

You can modify each note and thereby influence directly the intonation, phrasing and dynamics â€“ and do this not only with vocals and monophonic instruments but with polyphonic instruments such as pianos and guitars as well.

Working with Melodyne is like being able to say to a vocalist â€œsing this note a bit longerâ€ or to a pianist â€œgive slightly less weight to the third in this chordâ€ â€“ hours, weeks, even years after the recording session.
